sections.MISSION:
1/2CR Reconnaissance Platoon conducts M4 long range marksmanship day familiarization on 17 May 2024 on RG 114 to build confidence in primary weapon systems and improve combat readiness.
Commanderâ€™s
sections.PURPOSE: of this range is to provide the Reconnaissance Platoon with the opportunity to participate in long range marksmanship training.
sections.KEY TASKS:
Confirm Zero
Conduct stand off and holds
Conduct LRM Modified qualification
sections.END STATE:
The Reconnaissance Platoon successfully conducts long range marksmanship training during the day. Each soldier within the platoon will gain increased confidence in their primary weapon system.
Training Objectives
Conduct dry fire and range classes
Confirm M4 zero
Conduct long range practice fire
Confirm stand offs and holds on moving targets
Conduct long range modified qualification
